summary: Greenwood High career exploration web app scaffolded with a Motoko backend canister and a React + Vite + Tailwind frontend, including Internet Identity auth, career quiz/explore pages, mentors/videos/resources sections, and a school timeline UI with generated placeholder assets.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Backend service implemented in Motoko with generated Candid bindings and frontend declarations for canister interaction.

existing_features.title: React + Vite + Tailwind frontend scaffold
existing_features.description: Frontend application bootstrapped with Vite, Tailwind CSS, shared app layout/components, and routing/pages structure.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration
existing_features.description: Client-side hooks and logic to authenticate users via Internet Identity and create an authenticated canister actor.

existing_features.title: Career exploration pages and data
existing_features.description: Career quiz and career exploration pages backed by local data modules for careers and quiz content.

existing_features.title: Mentor connections and profiles UI
existing_features.description: Mentor connections page and mentor profile page with supporting hooks for fetching/handling mentors.

existing_features.title: Videos browsing and detail UI
existing_features.description: Videos listing page and video detail page with a safe embed component and a videos hook.

existing_features.title: Resources and school timeline pages
existing_features.description: Resources page and a school timeline page for students to track milestones/checkpoints.

existing_features.title: Reusable UI components and utilities
existing_features.description: Shared UI components (layout, animated sections, copy blocks, multi-select, navigation) plus storage client and config modules.

existing_features.title: Build template and tooling for ICP deployment
existing_features.description: Included build-template project configuration (Dockerfile, deploy script, canister YAMLs, workspace configs) and image utility scripts for resizing/pruning assets.

existing_features.title: Generated placeholder visual assets
existing_features.description: Generated PNG assets included for branding/backgrounds and UI icon sets.

existing_features.title: Update the global theme text color tokens so that all standard text colors render as bright white across the entire UI (including default text, muted text, and component foreground variants).

Audit and update any hard-coded non-white text utility classes in the appâ€™s components/pages so they also render bright white (e.g., any `text-red-*`, `text-gray-*`, or similar explicit color utilities).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update global typography styling so all font/text colors render as bright white across the app UI.

architectural_notes: Architecture: ICP dapp with Motoko backend canister + React/Vite/Tailwind frontend, connected via generated Candid bindings.
Auth: Uses Internet Identity on the frontend; authenticated actor created via hooks to call the backend canister.
UI stack: shadcn-ui component set included in build-template; app uses shared layout/nav components and page-based routing structure.
Assets pipeline: build-template includes scripts to resize/prune images; generated placeholder PNGs stored under frontend/public/assets/generated.

generatedImages.description: Generated icon set used for mindmap/navigation concepts
Generated checkpoint icon set for the school timeline UI

projectName: Make all text render bright white across the app
